mdRecord.dcterms:title: The home of Washington Illustrated. No. 7
Old Family Vault.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the old tomb by Alexander Gardner, 1866-1875. The view shows the tomb surrounded by a wooden picket fence with bricked steps leading up to and away from the structure in a heavily wooded background. The stereograph is No. 7 in a group of 30 views. Albumen print affixed to a cardboard mount with printed list of views and photographer's contact information on the reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
